norton detects virus in the dll file.....anyone else having the problem?
im stuck at the screen where it says press enter,i tryed to press everything and nothing responded,any ideas?
It's not a virus, people.  Because it is a modified file from the original to allow access into the game, any virus scanner will flag it.  It's called a "false-positive".
works great 1st time no problems..anyone who cant get this working 1st time needs to sell there PC and get an xbox..fking noobs hate them..;)..thanks again AITB great upload.
and theres no viruses..and works great..    i3 overclocked to 3.7ghz,,4gb ddr3,radeon 5770 OC, windows 7 64..got all settings running at max no lag no problems.;)

try disabling your crossfire..some games just dont like it..mine is working fine on highest graphic settings..only thing i can think of sorry.;(
virus detect by anti-malware how close this and past crack in folder.

Any one having problems with crashing on first race. Uninstall nvidia Phyx driver, and install the one provided with the game.
